metadata.title: CVE-2022-48979 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: fix array index out of bound error in DCN32 DML[Why&How]LinkCapacitySupport array is indexed with the number of voltage states andnot the number of max DPPs. Fix the error by changing the arraydeclaration to use the correct (larger) array size of total number ofvoltage states.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
